scripts.clean: rm -rf terraform/build && (cd terraform && terraform destroy <<< yes)
scripts.build-message: mkdir -p terraform/build && zip -qr terraform/build/process-message.zip process-message/ node_modules/ utils/
scripts.build-all: npm run build-message && npm run build-conformance && npm run build-bulkdata
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build-all
scripts.deploy: (cd terraform && terraform init && terraform apply <<< yes)
scripts.build-deploy: npm run build-all && npm run deploy
scripts.clean-deploy: npm run clean && npm run build-deploy
